<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Dammerich (The Weighted Swing)](/Deities.aspx?ID=117)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="LG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 128 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Empyreal Lords
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=10)

**Edicts** Perform just executions, study local laws, oppose corrupt or bloodthirsty government officials

**Anathema** Kill without thought, execute the innocent, mock the condemned, falsely incriminate another

**Follower Alignments**
LG

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Constitution or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

**Favored Weapon** [Greataxe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=21)

**Domains** [Death](/Domains.aspx?ID=7), [Duty](/Domains.aspx?ID=45), [Truth](/Domains.aspx?ID=32), [Vigil](/Domains.aspx?ID=55)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[True Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=345)

- **3rd**
[Paralyze](/Spells.aspx?ID=213)

- **4th**
[Stoneskin](/Spells.aspx?ID=312)

</column>
name: Dammerich (The Weighted Swing)
